website_summaries.verdict: Engineered to help reduce inflammation and relieve nerve-related pain while moisturizing dry skin.
pros: Not only is the cream incredibly moisturizing but it also includes  natural ingredients, such as eucalyptus, that are healing
Reviews suggest this cream helps fight pain derived from real medical conditions
cons: Reports differ in terms of how long the pain relief lasts, with a few hours on the low side

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my husband's neuropathy in his feet. I use it after he showers. It is easy to use and the smell isn't unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hagman

customer_reviews.title: It’s wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! I put it on every night before I go to bed. It’s like my “treat” to give myself. I fall asleep faster and wake up more rested because I’ve had NO foot pain!
customer_reviews.author: Derys

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This pain cream worked great for a couple weeks then I could not tell any difference. I do have a very bad ankle so I do not know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain gone, what a relief
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on a friends recommendation and sure enough it eased the pain from standing on my feet in steel toed boots all day
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for foot pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: Helps with numbness, pain and other issues. Very effective. Helps for muscle pain too.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Real Time foot cream
customer_reviews.text: The foot cream helps for a couple hours, long enough for me to get to sleep and it wears off in about 3-4 hours then I reapply. It has a nice soft refreshing smell. An application doesn't take much so a jar lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the third jar we bought. Usually get it locally but was ordering other stuff anyway, and it was available, so ordered. Husband says it's pretty good, not perfect but the best topical he has found.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sleeper

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my mother-in-law and she swears by it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother-in-law and she swears by it to relieve foot pain. I've also used the product for tennis elbow. Really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Blueblazr

customer_reviews.title: I have neuropathy, Applying this cream before bed eliminates ...
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy, Applying this cream before bed eliminates burning pain and numbness in my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Majic

customer_reviews.title: No comment
customer_reviews.text: Are use on the heel of my foot for arthritis it seems to work very well
customer_reviews.author: SALLY VOLLMER

customer_reviews.title: Shipping problems
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but this time it arrived with a broken lid and the cream spilled out in the bag. 😩
customer_reviews.author: sanstin

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Decreased my foot pain tremendously! Also keeps the once very dry and scaly, very moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: JUST OKAY
customer_reviews.text: JUST OKAY I LOVE LOVE LOVE The regular real time in the tube. So I thought this would be great for my feet. I really do not feel that it has the same effective ingredients as the tube. So I would just buy the tube and use it on my feet before going with this. But everyone is different. So if this review is not helpful to you....do as I do and read more.
customer_reviews.author: Stella57

customer_reviews.title: best we've owned
customer_reviews.text: my wife has very bad nerve damage and we've tried over 10 different products--she rates this as most effective --last 4-5 hours( compared to1-2 for other products) will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: chuck wagner

customer_reviews.title: External Extimity Relief
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I are Senior Citizens with periodic foot pain. Real Time Pain Relief was highly recommended by a family member for arthritis or external extremity discomfort. WORKS and back onto our feet!
customer_reviews.author: mndford

customer_reviews.title: Helped with the pain
customer_reviews.text: It did help with the pain but I don’t like how it feels greasy. Not a big fan of the scent but that’s just me.
customer_reviews.author: Kat G

customer_reviews.title: Not very good!
customer_reviews.text: The foot cream ($35) is not as good as the maxx pain relief pump ($40). It's not as strong, regret I got the foot cream. Wish it's a money back guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Gone fishin'

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: The cream works okay, but I am not a fan of smelling like medicine. Also, the cover of the jar came broken with the seal broken...and this item was not returnable. Obviously it will be difficult to keep the product intact without a proper cover.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many products for my knees and this is the only one that works for me. The smell is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great product that doesn't dry your skin
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my feet every morning and night. Really helps with numbness and pain.
customer_reviews.author: triathlondude

customer_reviews.title: Helps leg and foot pain.
customer_reviews.text: Used to reduce intermittent pain during my Peritoneal Dialysis. Also helps with leg cramps.
customer_reviews.author: William R Bartels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was in in constant knee pain, but once I applied this product, the pain was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Real Time Pain Relief Foot Cream, 8 Ounce Jar
feature_bullets: Easy to Use- Real Time Pain Relief is designed for easy, everyday use. It absorbs quickly, is non-greasy, and smells great too!
Smells Great- Unlike other pain relief lotions with a medicinal smell, Real Time Pain Relief formulas are crafted to release a wonderfully fresh smell.

Recipe for Success- While virtually all of the name-brand topical pain relief companies utilize parabens, SLS and artificial dyes to keep their product cost down, Real Time Pain Relief is committed to not using these harmful chemicals. Additionally, Real Time Pain Relief formulas do NOT contain NSAIDs or acetaminophen.
FDA Registered OTC- Real Time Pain Relief offers FDA Registered Over-the-Counter (OTC) drugs.

All Real Time Pain Relief formulas are made in a FDA monitored facility. Trusted Pain Relief- Thousands of Real Time Pain Relief customers have shared satisfied testimonials about finally finding pain relief that they can trust. Our family owned and operated business is proud to say that we’ve been around for over 20 years.
